General.Name: Gujarat Ambuja Exports Limited
General.Description: Gujarat Ambuja Exports Limited primarily engages in the agro processing activities in India and internationally. The company operates through Agro, Yarn Spinning, Maize, Power, and Other segments. It offers cotton yarns; wheat processing; and polyols, and sorbitol. In addition, the company provides bakery shortenings, cotton seed refined oils, corn and groundnut refined oils, refined palm oil, soyabean refined oil, and vanaspati ghee; and soya flour/fakes/grits, liquid soya lecithin, and soya granules and nuggets. Further, it feed ingredients, such as corn/maize gluten, rapeseed extraction, and soyabean meals, as well as cattle feed; and starch derivatives, including high maltose corn syrup, dextrose syrup, corn gluten meal, maize germ, malto dextrin powder, dextrins, dextrose anhydrous, dextrose monohydrate powder, maltose syrup, liquid glucose, maize and corn starch, and liquid sorbitol solution. Additionally, the company is involved in the power generation through windmills, biogas, thermal, and solar plants. It serves textile, paper, food, feed, cosmetics, pharmaceutical, and animal nutrition industries. Gujarat Ambuja Exports Limited was founded in 1986 and is based in Ahmedabad, India.
